common.linkNotCopied: The link could not be copied

loadError.title: Load Error
loadError.message: The app could not load all necessary components. You can try to reload by swiping upwards.
loadError.overrideMapServiceBaseUrlPrompt: Enter a custom URL for the service. Leave empty to use the default value.
loadError.overrideMapServiceBaseUrlButton: Enter custom URL for the service
loadError.resetMapServiceBaseUrlPrompt: The URL has been reset to the default value. The app will now reload.

rotationUnsupported.title: Rotate screen
rotationUnsupported.message1: To use this app you need to rotate your device to portrait mode.
rotationUnsupported.message2: Please rotate your device and continue discovering Halmstad.

noGuidesAvailable.title: No guides available
noGuidesAvailable.content: Unfortunately, we don't have any guides available in your language yet. But we are working on producing them in the future, so stay tuned!

share.title: Share link
share.instructions: You can copy the link to the Audio guide to your device's clipboard, allowing you to easily paste it into a message or any other application.

panelRight.filterUnavailableMessage: The category filter is disabled because a guide is active. Finish the guide and come back to view and filter the categories.
panelRight.noCategoriesSelectedMessage: You must select at least one category, otherwise you won't see any guides.

error404.title: Not Found
error404.message: Something went wrong. We apologize for the inconvenience.

errorUnsupportedOs.title: Your system is not supported ðŸ˜”
errorUnsupportedOs.message: Unfortunately, the app cannot be loaded on your device because the system requirements are not met. If possible, upgrade to iOS 15 or later, or use another device. Halmstad Stories also works on desktop.

install.title: Download as an app
install.introMessage: To get the best possible experience from the app, you can add it to your device.
install.instructionsIos: To add the app on iOS, tap the Share button (it may look like an arrow pointing upwards). In the menu that appears, select "Add to Home Screen".
install.instructionsAndroid: To add the app on Android, you need to select your browser's menu (often displayed as three dots, "...") and tap "Install App".
install.instructionsOther: Look in your browser for buttons like "Share", "Install", or "Add to Home Screen".

about.title: About Halmstad Stories
about.pageContentHtml:
Welcome to Halmstad's audio guide. Here you can enjoy exciting and dramatized tours around Halmstad. The audio guide was launched before the summer of 2024 with four unique guided tours.

You can choose whether to follow a guide or create your own by visiting the stops that suit you. Keep an eye out for more guides, as we continuously add new ones.

If you have any questions about the guide, feel free to contact Halmstad Tourist Center.

demo.title: This is a demo
demo.message1: Hello and welcome to the Halmstad Stories!
demo.message2: Please note that what you see is a very early demo version of the product where nothing is finalized. You will encounter oddities, things will behave differently than expected, and features will be missing.
demo.message3: This message will appear every time the app starts.

guideSheetContent.closeGuideDialogMessage: Do you really want to close the guide?
guideSheetContent.alreadyOnFirstStopDialogMessage: You are already at the first stop. Do you want to go back and end up at the last stop in the guide?
guideSheetContent.alreadyOnLastStopDialogMessage: You are already at the last stop. Do you want to restart the guide from the first stop?

olMap.userOutsideMapMessage: To show your position on the map, you need to be within its coverage area. You can still use the app, but you won't be able to see your position on the map.
olMap.locationErrorPermission: To determine your location, the app needs your permission. Please change your device settings and reload the app.
olMap.locationErrorOther: Failed to retrieve location information due to an error encountered by one or more internal sources.
olMap.distanceToPoint: You are approximately {{distance}} m (straight-line distance) from this location.
olMap.confirmAbortAudioPlaybackMessage: Audio is currently playing. Changing steps will abort playback. Are you sure you want to change steps?
olMap.confirmAbortVideoPlaybackMessage: Video is currently playing. Changing steps will abort playback. Are you sure you want to change steps?
